description: Successful Red Bull can grab — manually positioned by user 2026-02-10

notes.J4: 88.7° — wrist pointed nearly straight down (gripper faces floor)
notes.gripper: 32.5mm — closed on Red Bull can (66mm diameter, gripper grips sides)

observations.arm_posture: Nearly vertical reach-down — shoulder forward, elbow barely bent, wrist pointed straight down
observations.can_position: Directly below arm base, on workspace mat with green tape marker
observations.grip_style: Side grip on can body, gripper at ~32.5mm (can is 66mm dia, so gripper compressed ~33mm)

camera_snapshots.overhead: Arm extended up-right, holding object, Red Bull can visible on table
camera_snapshots.arm_mounted: Looking down at workspace mat, can with barcode visible below gripper
